verses.verse: Then some <S%H376><s%> elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me and sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have set <S%H5927><s%> up their idols <S%H1544><s%> in their hearts, <S%H3820><s%> and have put <S%H5414><s%> right <S%H5227><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> the stumbling <S%H4383><s%> block <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> Should I be consulted <S%H1875><s%> by them at all <S%H1875><s%>?

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to them and tell <S%H559><s%> them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Any <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> sets <S%H5927><s%> up his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> puts <S%H7760><s%> right <S%H5227><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> the stumbling <S%H4383><s%> block <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and [then] comes <S%H935><s%> to the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be brought <S%H6030><s%> to give <S%H6030><s%> him an answer <S%H6030><s%> in the matter in view of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his idols, <S%H1544><s%>

in order <S%H4616><s%> to lay <S%H8610><s%> hold <S%H8610><s%> of the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are estranged <S%H2114><s%> from Me through all <S%H3605><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%> "'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Repent <S%H7725><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from your idols, <S%H1544><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

"For anyone <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> or of the immigrants <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> stay <S%H1481><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> who separates <S%H5144><s%> himself from Me, sets <S%H5927><s%> up his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> puts <S%H7760><s%> right <S%H5227><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> the stumbling <S%H4383><s%> block <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and [then] comes <S%H935><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Me for himself, I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be brought <S%H6030><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> him in My own person.

"And I shall set <S%H5414><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%> and make <S%H7760><s%> him a sign <S%H226><s%> and a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and I shall cut <S%H3772><s%> him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> My people. <S%H5971><s%> So you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"But if <S%H3588><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is prevailed <S%H6601><s%> upon to speak <S%H1696><s%> a word, <S%H1697><s%> it is I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> who have prevailed <S%H6601><s%> upon that prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him and destroy <S%H8045><s%> him from among <S%H8432><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"And they will bear <S%H5375><s%> [the punishment of] their iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> as the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the inquirer <S%H1875><s%> is, so the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> will be,

in order <S%H4616><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> stray <S%H8582><s%> from Me and no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves with all <S%H3605><s%> their transgressions. <S%H6588><s%> Thus they will be My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I shall be their God, <S%H430><s%> "'declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>"
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> a country <S%H776><s%> sins <S%H2398><s%> against Me by committing <S%H4603><s%> unfaithfulness, <S%H4603><s%> and I stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, destroy <S%H7665><s%> its supply <S%H4294><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> against it, and cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from it both man <S%H120><s%> and beast, <S%H929><s%>

even [though] these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job <S%H347><s%> were in its midst, <S%H8432><s%> by their [own] righteousness <S%H6666><s%> they could [only] deliver <S%H5337><s%> themselves, <S%H5315><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"If <S%H3863><s%> I were to cause wild <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H9130><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and they depopulated <S%H7921><s%> it, and it became <S%H1961><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> so <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> that no <S%H1097><s%> one <S%H1097><s%> would pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> it because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts, <S%H9130><s%>

[though] these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> were in its midst, <S%H8432><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "they could not deliver <S%H5337><s%> either <S%H518><s%> [their] sons <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H518><s%> [their] daughters. <S%H1323><s%> They alone <S%H905><s%> would be delivered, <S%H5337><s%> but the country <S%H776><s%> would be desolate. <S%H8077><s%>

"Or <S%H176><s%> [if] I should bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> on that country <S%H776><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Let the sword <S%H2719><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the country <S%H776><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it,'

even [though] these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> were in its midst, <S%H8432><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "they could not deliver <S%H5337><s%> either [their] sons <S%H1121><s%> or [their] daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but they alone <S%H905><s%> would be delivered. <S%H5337><s%>

"Or <S%H176><s%> [if] I should send <S%H7971><s%> a plague <S%H1698><s%> against <S%H413><s%> that country <S%H776><s%> and pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> in blood <S%H1818><s%> on it, to cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it,

even [though] Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job <S%H347><s%> were in its midst, <S%H8432><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "they could not deliver <S%H5337><s%> either <S%H518><s%> [their] son <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H518><s%> [their] daughter. <S%H1323><s%> They would deliver <S%H5337><s%> only themselves <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness. <S%H6666><s%> "

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> more <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> My four <S%H702><s%> severe <S%H7451><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> famine, <S%H7458><s%> wild <S%H7451><s%> beasts, <S%H9130><s%> and plague <S%H1698><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it!

"Yet, behold, <S%H2009><s%> survivors <S%H6413><s%> will be left <S%H3498><s%> in it who will be brought <S%H3318><s%> out, [both] sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are going to come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to you and you will see <S%H7200><s%> their conduct <S%H1870><s%> and actions; <S%H5949><s%> then you will be comforted <S%H5162><s%> for the calamity <S%H9567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for everything <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon it.

"Then they will comfort <S%H5162><s%> you when <S%H3588><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> their conduct <S%H1870><s%> and actions, <S%H5949><s%> for you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I have not done <S%H6213><s%> in vain <S%H2600><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> to it," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
